column5: I can't find what I'm looking for anywhere.. I'm looking for a small decal of my name in script that I can put on my rods for that personal touch.. Can anyone point me in the right direction??? Thanks..
http://www.mudhole.com/Rod-Building/Decals-Decorations/Customizable-Text-Decals  Then cover with some clear nail polish.  Or get a rod builder to do it the right way, lol.
When I used to make a lot of rods I used " Letraset " to personalize with a name, the gold leaf was nice, they still make it.
